translations: n.[微]螺旋体；螺旋菌；螺旋原虫（Spirochete 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: of which 10-36% may be infected with Lyme disease spirochetes.
sentences.translation: 大部分（约98%）莱姆病和鹿虱幼虫叮咬有关，其中10-36%可能感染莱姆病螺旋体。

sentences.sentence: The same tick species collected from different sites were similarly incapable of maintaining live Lyme spirochetes.
sentences.translation: 同种蜱不同地理株在感染和保持莱姆病螺旋体的能力上也没有差异。

sentences.sentence: The probability of transmission of Lyme disease spirochetes increases the longer an infected tick is attached 0% at 24 hours, 12% at 48 hours, 79% at.
sentences.translation: 随着带病毒蜱虫附着人体时间增加，莱姆螺旋体感染几率也随之提升(24小时0%，48小时12%，72小时79%，96小时则高达94%。)幼虱作用人体约需30小时，成虫仅需10小时，幼虱约是成虫的2倍。
